vocabinfos.relatedNos: [{'strongNumber': 'H0844H', 'matchingForm': 'אַשְׂרִיאֵל', 'stepTransliteration': 'as.ri.el', 'gloss': 'Asriel', '_searchResultRange': '1Chr.7.14', '_zh_tw_Gloss': '亞斯列', '_es_Gloss': 'Asriel', '_zh_Gloss': '亚斯列'}, {'strongNumber': 'H0845', 'matchingForm': 'אַשְׂרִיאֵלִי', 'stepTransliteration': 'as.ri.e.li', 'gloss': 'Asrielite', '_searchResultRange': 'Num.26.31@Num.26.31-Josh.17.2', '_zh_tw_Gloss': '亞斯列人', '_es_Gloss': 'Asrielitas', '_zh_Gloss': '亚斯列人'}]
vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Manasseh living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Num.26.31;
son of: Gilead (H1568H);
brother of: Abiezer (H0044I), Helek (H2507), Shechem (H7928), Shemida (H8061) and Hepher (H2660A)
Also named: as.ri.e.li (אַשְׂרִיאֵלִי "Asrielite" H0845)
§ Ashriel or Asriel = "I shall be prince of God"
1) a great-grandson of Manasseh, and son of Gilead
2) a son of Manasseh
vocabinfos._es_Definition: hijo de Galaad; tribu de Manasés
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞斯列 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "我將會是神的王子"
1) 瑪拿西的曾孫, 基列的兒子
2) 瑪拿西的兒子
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
亚斯列 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "我将会是神的王子"
1) 玛拿西的曾孙, 基列的儿子
2) 玛拿西的儿子

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Manasseh living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at 1Ch.7.14;
son of: Manasseh (H4519);
brother of: Machir (H4353)
§ Ashriel or Asriel = "I shall be prince of God"
1) a great-grandson of Manasseh, and son of Gilead
2) a son of Manasseh
